markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 6+"
    pfs="Restricted"
>
[Wand of Choking Mist](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2272)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Wand" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=164" />
<trait label="Water" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=165" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 138 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This blackened wood wand has a smoldering tip, emitting a slight trail of steam.

**Activate** <actions string="" /> Cast a Spell;  **Frequency** once per day, plus overcharge;   **Effect** You cast the wand's spell, but the mist prevents creatures from being able to breathe in its area. They must hold their breath or start [suffocating](/Rules.aspx?ID=468).

**Craft Requirements** Supply a casting of [_mist_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1606) for the 2nd-rank wand or [_cinder swarm_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1350) for the 4th-rank wand.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 6"
pfs="Restricted"
>
Wand of Choking Mist (2nd-Rank Spell)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 138 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 250 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

---

The spell is _mist_.

<title
level="2"
right="Item 10"
pfs="Restricted"
>
Wand of Choking Mist (4th-Rank Spell)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 138 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 1,000 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

---

The spell is _cinder swarm_.
name: Wand of Choking Mist
